named-query.name: Statuses.deleteOld
named-query.query: delete from FeedEntryStatus s where s.entryInserted < :date and s.starred = false

named-query.name: EntryStatus.existing
named-query.query: select new com.commafeed.backend.dao.FeedEntryDAO$EntryWithFeed(e, f) FROM FeedEntry e LEFT JOIN e.feedRelationships f WITH f.feed.id = :feedId where e.guidHash = :guidHash and e.url = :url
